p: The leaves of Haplophyllum canaliculatum Boiss. were harvested from altitude 1300 meters of Tang Zagh mountains with 27°933′44″ latitude and 55°916′66″ longitude in Hormozgan province, Iran, in November 2013. Voucher specimens (1513-AUPF) have been deposited at the herbarium of Pharmaceutical Science Branch, Islamic Azad University Tehran, Iran. The collected tissue was dried under shade at room temperature.
